attributes.action: Stop tuition fees from being £9,000 a year!
attributes.additional_details: I am very lucky that in September when I start University I will only be paying £3,500 per year, however when my sister hopefully goes to Uni in about 2 years time she will be on the full amount of £9,000 and that total doesn't even include halls of residence fees, food costs etc. This will stop so many bright and talented people from going to University as the crippling debts will always be looming in the back of their minds and its not fair especially since the vast majority of our MPs got to go to University for free!!
